Ebbro 44605 Nissan Fairlady 240ZG 1972 Fuji Grand Champion Series H. Yanagida

Purchased: 2014
Manufacturer Page: http://www.ebbro.jp/SHOP/44605.html

This is Haruhito Yanagida's Nissan 240ZG from the 1972 Fuji Grand Champion series. Some sites indicate this is the winning car from the 2nd race of the series although Ebbro doesn't indicate which race it represents.
